custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: VertexAnomaly
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ImageSentinel
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that provides an Image Loader that updates inside the workflow when the Image file is changed. This allows for a easy bridge between 3D software, and 2D art applications while retaining use of a full workflow rather than being restricted to a plugin.

custom_nodes.author: Moooonet
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Align
custom_nodes.description: A powerful node alignment and color management plugin for ComfyUI, designed to enhance your workflow efficiency

custom_nodes.author: hekmon
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OpenAI API
custom_nodes.description: Call LLM and VLM in a simple way using the OpenAI API standard from ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: kayselmecnun
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen-25-VL
custom_nodes.description: A custom Comfy UI node for using Qwen2.5-VL-3B/7B-Instruct models

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-openai_fm
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates OpenAI last T2S capabilities for free

custom_nodes.author: ryanontheinside
custom_nodes.title: Control Freak for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Control Freak gives you physical control over your ComfyUI workflows by mapping MIDI controllers, gamepads, and other input devices to any node parameter or UI element. Transform your image generation experience with tactile, responsive control. Ever heard of 'flow state'?

custom_nodes.author: Jokimbe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DrawThings-gRPC
custom_nodes.description: Connect to any Draw Things gRPC server

custom_nodes.author: iSuneast
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WebhookNotifier
custom_nodes.description: The Webhook Notification plugin for ComfyUI, used to send webhook notifications when image generation is complete.

custom_nodes.author: mobilehacker
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_format-lora-stack
custom_nodes.description: Simple node to convert lora_stack output into string to generate a1111-style lora strength output text, like <lora:name:0.69>. Used to include your Lora names from Lora Stack in text input-output nodes and so on.

custom_nodes.author: ZhiHui6
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_zhihui_nodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: Prompt Preset, Video Batch Loader, Video Combiner

custom_nodes.author: bvhari
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CFGStar
custom_nodes.description: A per channel implementation of the scaled CFG from this paper: [a/https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.18886](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.18886)

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LayerAnimate
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for LayerAnimate model.

custom_nodes.author: CY-CHENYUE
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GPT-API
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI to integrate GPT API.

custom_nodes.author: joeriben
custom_nodes.title: AI4ArtsEd Ollama Prompt Node
custom_nodes.description: Experimental nodes for ComfyUI. For more, see [a/https://kubi-meta.de/ai4artsed](https://kubi-meta.de/ai4artsed) A custom ComfyUI node for stylistic and cultural transformation of input text using local LLMs served via Ollama. This node allows you to combine a free-form prompt (e.g. translation, poetic recoding, genre shift) with externally supplied text in the ComfyUI graph. The result is processed via an Ollama-hosted model and returned as plain text.

custom_nodes.author: dimtion
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Raw-Image
custom_nodes.description: Comfyui-raw-image provides the ability to load raw image files for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: fredconex
custom_nodes.title: TripoSG Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Created by Alfredo Fernandes inspired by Hunyuan3D nodes by Kijai. This extension adds TripoSG 3D mesh generation capabilities to ComfyUI, allowing you to generate 3D meshes from a single image using the TripoSG model.

custom_nodes.author: WaveSpeedAI
custom_nodes.title: wavespeed-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to use the WaveSpeed AI API directly in ComfyUI. WaveSpeed AI is a high-performance AI image and video generation service platform offering industry-leading generation speeds. For more information, see [a/WaveSpeed AI Documentation](https://wavespeed.ai/docs).

custom_nodes.author: hekmon
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-checkpoint-extract
custom_nodes.description: Extract CLIP and VAE models from a loaded checkpoint in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: MoonGoblinDev
custom_nodes.title: Civicomfy - Civitai Model Downloader for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Civicomfy seamlessly integrates Civitai's vast model repository directly into ComfyUI, allowing you to search, download, and organize AI models without leaving your workflow.

custom_nodes.author: hunzmusic
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IG2MV
custom_nodes.description: This custom node package provides nodes specifically for using the mvadapter_ig2mv_sdxl.safetensors adapter within ComfyUI. This adapter is designed for image-guided multi-view generation, typically used for creating textures from 3D mesh renders (position and normal maps).

custom_nodes.author: Stable-X
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Hi3DGen
custom_nodes.description: This extension integrates [a/Hi3DGen](https://github.com/Stable-X/Hi3DGen) into ComfyUI, allowing user to generate high-fidelity 3D geometry generation from Images.

custom_nodes.author: LaVie024
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-lopi999-nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of some nodes I got Deepseek and ChatGPT to make. Mildly useful for some randomness and a scheduler.

custom_nodes.author: dream-computing
custom_nodes.title: SyntaxNodes - Image Processing Effects for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI designed to apply various image processing effects, stylizations, and analyses.

custom_nodes.author: zzubnik
custom_nodes.title: TT_TextTools
custom_nodes.description: Custom text tools for helping with multiple prompt generation in ComfyUI. These tools allow more variety than just relying on the randomness of the image generator. You can create related, themed prompts, random each time.

custom_nodes.author: rookiepsi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Extended
custom_nodes.description: Nodes for ComfyUI that extend the core functionality without adding extra dependencies.

custom_nodes.author: younyokel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Formatter
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides tools to clean, optimize, and format text prompts. It includes features like converting tags, aligning brackets, and applying weights to prompts.

custom_nodes.author: nxt5656
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image2OSS
custom_nodes.description: Upload the image to Alibaba Cloud OSS.

custom_nodes.author: zhuanqianfish
custom_nodes.title: TaesdDecoder
custom_nodes.description:
use TAESD decoded image.you need donwload taesd_decoder.pth and taesdxl_decoder.pth to vae_approx folder first.
 It will result in a slight loss of image quality and a significant decrease in peak video memory during decoding.

custom_nodes.author: Siempreflaco
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NCNodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: NC Audio Recorder, NC Line Counter, NC Increment INT, NC Image Processor

custom_nodes.author: livepeer
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Stream-Pack
custom_nodes.description: A suite of custom ComfyUI nodes for building real-time video and audio workflows using ComfyStream.

custom_nodes.author: thezveroboy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Random Image Loader
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that loads a random image from a specified folder and outputs it in the standard ComfyUI IMAGE format, along with a MASK and the image path as STRING. Images are loaded in their original dimensions.

custom_nodes.author: pnikolic-amd
custom_nodes.title: MIGraphX Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This node enables better performance for Stable Diffusion models, by leveraging AMD MIGraphX, on Navi3 and Navi4 GPUs.

custom_nodes.author: jax-explorer
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-easycontrol
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI EasyControl Nodes is a collection of nodes for ComfyUI that allows you to load and use EasyControl models.

custom_nodes.author: LAOGOU-666
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-LG_GroupExecutor
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension for controlling and managing node group execution flow. Features include single/multiple group execution, delay control, signal chaining, and execution list repetition processing.

custom_nodes.author: bemoregt
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CustomNode_Image2Spectrum
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Custom Node for converting images to frequency spectrum visualizations using FFT

custom_nodes.author: DiffusionWave
custom_nodes.title: PickResolution_DiffusionWave
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that allows selecting a base resolution, applying a custom scaling value based on FLOAT (up to 10 decimal places), and adding an extra integer value. Outputs include both INT and FLOAT resolutions, making it perfect for you to play around with.

custom_nodes.author: Michael Gold
custom_nodes.title: Hal.fun Hugging Face Model Downloader
custom_nodes.description: Easily download and install 2D to 3D and Flux models from Hugging Face.

custom_nodes.author: Zar4X
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Batch-Process
custom_nodes.description: A collection of nodes for batch processing texts and images in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Zar4X
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image-Resizing
custom_nodes.description: Precision dimension control nodes for aspect ratio adjustments and resizing workflows

custom_nodes.author: Sekiun
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WebpToPNGSequence
custom_nodes.description: Utility node for converting a .webp format image into sequential png images in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Ky11le
custom_nodes.title: ygo_tools
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom ComfyUI nodes designed for creating Yu-Gi-Oh! card illustrations.

custom_nodes.author: penposs
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_wan_api
custom_nodes.description: Free trial of Tongyi Wanxiang wan2.1 model, this is a batch implementation of wan2.1 API, providing batch processing for your short video production.

custom_nodes.author: ainewsto
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-chatgpt-api
custom_nodes.description: A new ComfyUI node for OpenAI's ChatGPT API has been added. It currently supports single and multiple image inputs, text input, image generation, and image editing.

custom_nodes.author: cleanlii
custom_nodes.title: DalleImageNodes - OpenAI DALL·E Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
DalleImageNodes is a custom extension for ComfyUI that integrates OpenAI's DALL·E 3 API for: Image generation, Inpainting (image editing), Image variation.
This project supports the latest OpenAI Python SDK (v1.x) and automatically handles image resizing and format requirements (RGBA, fixed sizes) based on the examples from the offical Dall-E website.

custom_nodes.author: olduvai-jp
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CloudArchive
custom_nodes.description: Automatically archives generated files to Amazon S3 or S3-compatible storage services

custom_nodes.author: Yushan777
custom_nodes.title: Y7Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A collection of utility / quality-of-life nodes for ComfyUI. Probably only useful to me.

custom_nodes.author: ImagineerNL
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ToSVG-Potracer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node to vectorize images using the pure Python 'potracer' library.

custom_nodes.author: ZenAI-Vietnam
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_InfiniteYou
custom_nodes.description: An implementation of InfiniteYou for ComfyUI. Native support for [a/InfiniteYou](https://github.com/bytedance/InfiniteYou) in ComfyUI, designed by the ZenAI team.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Personalize_Anything
custom_nodes.description: Personalize Anything for Free with Diffusion Transformer,use it in comfyUI with wrapper mode

custom_nodes.author: rainlizard
custom_nodes.title: Raffle
custom_nodes.description: A semi-random prompt generator for danbooru tags that works alongside your character prompt, allowing you to put your waifu in many scenarios. (for Illustrious/NoobAI/Pony)

custom_nodes.author: Fuou Marinas
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MatAnyone
custom_nodes.description: MatAnyone in ComfyUI (Remove background)

custom_nodes.author: jupo-ai
custom_nodes.title: comfy-ex-tagcomplete
custom_nodes.description: tag completer with csv file

custom_nodes.author: game4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BDsInfiniteYou
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom_node for [a/ByteDance's InfiniteYou](https://github.com/bytedance/InfiniteYou).

custom_nodes.author: Creepybits
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Creepy_nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of switch nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: felixszeto
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RequestNodes
custom_nodes.description: This is a request node tool designed for making HTTP requests (GET/POST) to APIs and viewing the responses. It is useful for API testing and development.

custom_nodes.author: PiggyDance
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_OpenCV
custom_nodes.description: OpenCV nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: wywywywy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Pause Workflow Node
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node to pause a workflow

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: Google Moogle
custom_nodes.description: AGoogle Moogle is a Google Translator node for ComfyUI that provides easy-to-use text translation capabilities directly within your ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: orex2121
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-OreX
custom_nodes.description: comfyui-OreX is a set of nodes for using LLM models via a free API.

custom_nodes.author: Gue-e
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PanoCard
custom_nodes.description: A plugin application that utilizes ComfyUI to generate 360-degree panoramic images. It primarily works by converting between flat images and equidistant cylindrical projections, stretching flat images into a curved format, and setting regional conditions, while harnessing the power of large models to produce 360-degree panoramic views.

custom_nodes.author: Pablerdo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ResizeZeptaPayload
custom_nodes.description: Resize a batch of trajectories or images

custom_nodes.author: stepfun-ai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-StepVideo
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains ComfyUI custom nodes for StepVideo.

custom_nodes.author: Flow-two
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanStartEndFramesNative
custom_nodes.description: Start and end frames video generation node that supports native ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: LoveEatCandy
custom_nodes.title: COMFYUI-ReplacePartOfImage
custom_nodes.description: Replace part of an image with another image

custom_nodes.author: zakantonio
custom_nodes.title: Avatar Generation Experience
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that transforms user photos into stylized character avatars.

custom_nodes.author: AIExplorer25
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_AutoDownloadModels
custom_nodes.description: This custom node helps to auto download models from huggingface

custom_nodes.author: Altair200333
custom_nodes.title: Flux Pro Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This plugin adds a new node to ComfyUI. The node uses the FLUX.1 Fill API to fill in parts of an image.
